name: ressunif
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

stmt.origin: resslem(c0, c1, c2, cunif, c3, c4, cdc(nat1, nat3))
stmt.pretty: resslem(c0, c1, c2, cunif, c3, c4, cdc(1, 3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(cunif, c3)))
-| wceq(c3, co(c4, cress, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cunif, c4))
-| wceq(cunif, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat3)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat3), cn)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(UnifSet ` c3))
⊣ c3 =(c4[|`s]c0)
⊣ c2 =(UnifSet ` c4)
⊣ UnifSet = Slot(cdc(1, 3))
⊣ cdc(1, 3)∈ ℕ
⊣ 1[<]cdc(1, 3)
